author: "David Ritter"
date: "2/22/2020"
output: html_document
runtime: shiny
---

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- "Do.you.seek.supportive.mental.health.services..counseling..or.other.therapy.within.or.outside.of.the.VA."
t <- "Do you seek supportive mental health services, counseling, or other therapy within or outside of the VA?"
q_data <- get_single_selection(data = raw_data, q.name = q)
q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
q_plot<- clean_single_select(q_data)
r <- plot_single_select(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
q_plot2 <- rbind(q_plot, t)
dir.create("output/q34_mental_health_services")
ggsave(filename = 'output/q34_mental_health_services/q34_mental_health_services.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot2, paste0("output/q34_mental_health_services/q34_mental_health_services_", q_n,".csv"), row.names=F)
```

```{r}
qf_data <- q_data %>%
  filter(response == "Response text")
```

```{r}
qf_all_data <- 
  qf_data %>%
  inner_join(q_data, by = "id")
qf_n <- length(unique(qf_all_data$id))
q_plot <- clean_single_select_y(qf_all_data)
r <- plot_single_select_y(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
q_plot2 <- rbind(q_plot, t)
dir.create("output/q34_mental_health_services")
ggsave(filename = 'output/q34_mental_health_services/q34_mental_health_services.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot2, paste0("output/q34_mental_health_services/q34_mental_health_services_", qf_n,".csv"), row.names=F)
```
